title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
text: The AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam validates an examinee's ability to: Describe the AWS Cloud and its value proposition, Describe core AWS services (compute, network, database, and storage), Describe security and compliance aspects of the AWS platform, and Describe AWS architecture best practices.

title: Full Stack Application Developer
text: This certification is meant to demonstrate one's ability to build real-world applications using the IBM Cloud, IBM Watson AI, Cloudant, Cloud Object Storage, IBM's Serverless Functions, and other IBM technologies.

title: Advanced Cloud Native Application Developer with Python
text: This certificate is designed to demonstrate your ability to build scalable, fault talerant, cloud-native applications using Python and Python Web Frameworks (Django, Flask, FastAPI and the Django Rest Framework) in the AWS environment while utilizing modern CI/CD practices.

title: Distributed Version Control Systems
text: This certificate is designed to demonstrate your ability to build scalable, fault talerant, cloud-native applications using Python and Python Web Frameworks (Django, Flask, FastAPI and the Django Rest Framework) in the AWS environment while utilizing modern CI/CD practices.

title: Certified PHP Engineer
text: The Zend Certified PHP Engineer is an industry-wide standard that recognizes PHP expertise and is a measure of distinction that employers use to evaluate prospective employees.

title: CompTIA A+
